title: New: Darkstar – News From Nowhere
body:
Darkstar’s latest offering strays away from the bass riddled lines of old and ventures into new territory with a distinctly Animal Collective-esque wall of electro reverb dissonance.

The album is only available for streaming as a whole, so you may do best to pop an ambien and watch your wallpaper dance for an hour as you soak it in…

[Physical copies of the album drop on 4th Feb 2013.](http://www.roughtrade.com/site/shop_detail.lasso?search_type=sku&sku=358055)
